lead_paragraph: Hope Solo has taken an indefinite leave from the Seattle Reign of the National Women's Soccer League, less than a week after being suspended for six months by the U.S. national team for disparaging remarks about Sweden.

headline.print_headline: Hope Solo Takes Indefinite Leave From Seattle Reign
headline.main: Hope Solo Takes Indefinite Leave From Seattle Reign
